channel.title: Do i have to do portforwarding?
channel.description: ok, ppl told me to portforward so i went back to that tutorial and it said it's for ppl who have routers, but first i had to run CMD and type in ipconfig, it said invalid, what is going on here? and any1 have a good reliable source i can download? I DON'T HAVE A ROUTER!!! can u portforward without a router?

item.title: Do i have to do portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

To use Utorrent, all you have to do is

  1. Download Utorrent.

  2. Once youve downloaded go to options>Preferences>Connections

  3. Where it has the port number type in 4359 (yes i left out the 4 on purpose)

  4. Run your source

  5. Once source is loaded, then type in the 4 on Utorrent.

  6. It should work (it did for me)

Read full topic
item.source: Do i have to do portforwarding?

item.title: Do i have to do portforwarding?
item.dc:creator: @Dvs_Chick Dvs Chick
item.description:
@Dvs_Chick wrote:

Okay well first of all port-forwarding is for people who have a router. So if you don’t have a router then you don’t need to port-forward.
